description:
Welcome to the party where the most daring and beautiful images await you!
Collect puzzles with photorealistic images of girls in spectacular outfits, enjoy convenient touch controls and feel the process at your fingertips.

Relaxing music creates the right mood, and gradually increasing difficulty turns each level into an exciting challenge. After assembly, you can carefully examine each image and appreciate all the details.

Features:

• Photorealistic images.

• Realistic assembly process.

• Gradually increasing difficulty.

• Relaxing music.

• Detailed image viewing.
